divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down longpoint road in mount pleasant south carolina, when I looked up into the night sky ahead of me, and saw what looked like 5 or 6 balls of fire sailing across with speed in a straight path. I tried locating my phone to grab a picture and had to pull over into the median. When I finally was able to take a picture, they had disbursed in different directions and were floating around like fire flies. I then, started heading back home and lost them in the cloud cover as I drew closer to my home. Im kind if freaked out right now. You can view the picture online on my FaceBook page Jennifer Bushman (the one feeding the prairie dogs) Thanks! Jxnny
Summary: several objects flew across night sky before disbursing in different directions.
